description: We're working on Open WebUI Tool servers, specifically how to get them all running from one docker compose file.
details: I've attached the filesystem server folder as well as the compose file. We're going to document how this server is built, and what Open WebUI requires, and then go to the next folder in this project until we've completed them all.
goal: Create a clear workflow on how to add new servers to this system for automated server integration
status: Starting analysis of the file structure
